### Description

### Installation

```r
swirl::install_course("Regression Models")
```

#### Manual Installation

1. Download [this](http://swirlstats.com/scn/Regression_Models.swc) file.
2. Run `swirl::install_course()` in the R console.
3. Select the file you just downloaded.
